Advantages Through Proper Timing.--The timing of things may tell much in favor of truth. Victories 
                                                                           652
are frequently lost through delays. There will be crises in this cause. Prompt and decisive action at the right time will gain glorious triumphs, while delay and neglect will result in great failures and positive dishonor to God.--Testimonies, vol. 3, p. 498. (1875)
